jobs.name: Builder
jobs.sentence1: Builders construct structures, manage projects, and ensure code compliance.
jobs.sentence2: They assemble scaffolding, apply finishes, and coordinate subcontractors.
jobs.sentence3: Safety inspections, excavation, and electrical wiring are common tasks.
jobs.tasks: Excavate building sites|Assemble scaffolding|Install electrical wiring|Waterproof structures

jobs.name: Carpenter
jobs.sentence1: Carpenters craft and repair wooden structures, from stairs to cabinets.
jobs.sentence2: They mill lumber, hang doors, and contribute to diverse woodworking projects.
jobs.sentence3: Essential in construction, they blend precision and craftsmanship.
jobs.tasks: Mill lumber|Construct stairs|Fit and hang doors

jobs.name: Dyer
jobs.sentence1: Dyers color fabrics, mixing solutions and performing color matching.
jobs.sentence2: Tasks include dyeing, quality checks, and developing new techniques.
jobs.sentence3: Their expertise enhances the visual appeal of diverse textile products.
jobs.tasks: Mix dye solutions|Perform color matching|Operate dyeing machinery|Conduct quality checks|Ensure color consistency

jobs.name: Plumber
jobs.sentence1: Plumbers fix leaks, install fixtures, and inspect sewer lines.
jobs.sentence2: They design plumbing systems, maintain water heaters, and respond to emergencies.
jobs.sentence3: Welding or soldering pipes is part of their skill set.
jobs.tasks: Repair pipe leaks|Install plumbing fixtures|Inspect sewer lines|Design plumbing systems|Weld or solder pipes|Maintain water heaters

jobs.name: Transporter
jobs.sentence1: Transporters plan logistics routes, load/unload cargo, and maintain vehicle fleets.
jobs.sentence2: They monitor shipping schedules, complete documents, and handle customs clearance.
jobs.sentence3: Coordination with warehouses ensures smooth transportation operations.
jobs.tasks: Plan logistics routes|Load and unload cargo|Maintain vehicle fleet|Monitor shipping schedules
